english.segment1: Knocked off my feet. The earth moved beneath. The edge of a dream and a nightmare
english.segment2: Open the door. Fell through the floor. Slipped through the cracks into nowhere
english.segment3: So tell me where were you. When everything fell down like thunder. I begged you to pull me through. I couldnt get out from under
english.segment4: I took the fall. I took it all. Last night was just an illusion
english.segment5: Cut me, I bleed. Feel me in need. I finally broke in the pressure
english.segment6: So tell me where were you. When everything fell down like thunder. I begged you to pull me through. I couldnt get out from under
english.segment7: Left me for dead inside my head. Couldnt you see that I was still breathing?. Screaming, I reached for you. I couldnt get out from under
english.segment8: Where were you?. I reached for you. The pressure broke me down
english.segment9: Where were you?. I reached for you. The pressure broke me
english.segment10: Where were you?. The pressure broke me. Where were you?. The pressure broke me. Where were you?. I reached for you
